name: FoodProvider
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crop facts
des: As we know lots of farmers are dying because they can't able to make revenue from their farm as they want. Just ask crop fact to Alexa, it will give you information regarding crops like time of yielding, a season for crop and many more.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
